summary: Provides a high-level interface to AWS EMR Serverless, enabling creation, retrieval, listing, updating, starting, stopping, and deletion of serverless applications, as well as management of job runs including initiation, cancellation, and status queries.
business_intent: To simplify automation and orchestration of EMR Serverless resources for data processing pipelines, allowing developers to programmatically control application lifecycles and job execution in the cloud.
